mapper.sql: tags->'name' as name, tags->'name:be' as name_be, tags->'name:be-tarask' as name_be_tarask, tags->'name:ru' as name_ru, tags->'int_name' as int_name, tags->'alt_name' as alt_name, tags->'alt_name:be' as alt_name_be, tags->'alt_name:ru' as alt_name_ru

, tags->'place' as place, tags->'addr:country' as addr_country, tags->'addr:region' as addr_region, tags->'addr:district' as addr_district, tags->'population' as population, tags->'population_date' as population_date, ST_AsEWKT(geom) as geom_text
mapper.select: SELECT id, type, FROM geo_cities WHERE id = #{value} AND type='NODE'
SELECT id, type, FROM geo_cities WHERE id = #{value} AND type='WAY'
SELECT id, type, FROM geo_cities WHERE id = #{value} AND type='RELATION'

SELECT id, 'WAY' as type, FROM ( SELECT * FROM geo_roads WHERE tags->'highway' NOT IN ('raceway','cycleway','path') AND NOT exist_key(tags, 'int_ref') AND NOT exist_key(tags, 'ref') ) as w WHERE ST_Intersects(geom, ST_GeomFromEWKT(#{value}))

SELECT id, 'WAY' as type, tags->'addr:street' as name, tags->'addr:street:be' as name_be FROM ( SELECT * FROM geo_houses WHERE exist_key(tags, 'addr:street') ) as w WHERE ST_Intersects(geom, ST_GeomFromEWKT(#{value}))
SELECT id, 'RELATION' as type, FROM geo_address_streets r WHERE ST_Intersects(geom, ST_GeomFromEWKT(#{value}))

SELECT 'WAY' as htype, h.id as hid, 'WAY' as htype, r.id as rid, h.tags->'addr:street' as name, r.tags->'name:be' as name_be FROM geo_houses h LEFT OUTER JOIN geo_roads r ON h.tags->'addr:street' = r.tags->'name' AND ST_Distance(h.geom, r.geom) < 0.1 WHERE ST_Intersects(h.geom, ST_GeomFromEWKT(#{value})) AND exist_key(h.tags, 'addr:housenumber')

SELECT 'WAY' as htype, h.id as hid, 'WAY' as htype, r.id as rid, h.tags->'addr:street' as name, r.tags->'name:be' as name_be FROM geo_houses h LEFT OUTER JOIN geo_roads r ON h.tags->'addr:street' = r.tags->'name' AND ST_Distance(h.geom, r.geom) < 0.1 WHERE exist_key(h.tags, 'addr:housenumber') AND h.geom IS NOT NULL

SELECT a.osm_id, a.name, a."name:be", a.place FROM osm_polygon a, osm_point p WHERE ST_Contains(a.way, p.way) AND p.osm_id=#{cityId} AND a.place IN ('city','town','village','hamlet','isolated_dwelling') ORDER BY ST_Area(a.way)

SELECT id, GREATEST(h.dx,h.dy) maxsize FROM ( SELECT id, (ST_XMax(geom)-ST_XMin(geom))*67138 dx, (ST_YMax(geom)-ST_YMin(geom))*111321 dy FROM geo_houses WHERE geom IS NOT NULL) h WHERE h.dx>600 OR h.dy>600 ORDER BY GREATEST(h.dx,h.dy) DESC
SELECT error, 'n' as type, id FROM nodes_error UNION SELECT error, 'w' as type, id FROM ways_error UNION SELECT error, 'r' as type, id FROM relations_error
